comment: Absolutely wonderful professor. She actually cares about her students and gives thoughtful encouraging feedback. There are a lot of projects, but they honestly don't even feel like work because they're actually fun to do. If you have a bit of creativity you will thrive in this class.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Clear grading criteria--GROUP PROJECTS

comment: 3241 is interesting because it's all about technology (specifically internet stuff) & that's just kind of fun, &  Dr. Moran is an angel. She's super sweet, well-organized, & just a really, really nice person. She genuinely cares about her students & that's not always common at college. She's an awesome professor and KSU is truly lucky to have her.
